GSD.product_version: versions from v3.12 to before v5.10.153
GSD.description:
drm/msm/hdmi: fix memory corruption with too many bridges

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.153 by commit 08c7375fa27a8ceee028868e03ffb3a0db919d44, it was introduced in version v3.12 by commit a3376e3ec81c5dd0622cbc187db76d2824d31c1c. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/msm/hdmi: fix memory corruption with too many bridges
OSV.details:
drm/msm/hdmi: fix memory corruption with too many bridges
